name: Harry the Baby Saves the World with his Amazing Water Pistol
overview: Harry the Baby Saves the World with his Amazing Water Pistol is a simple fixed screen shooter for the Sinclair ZX Spectrum. It was developed by Andrew Green and published as part of the 2014 CSSCGC, a yearly competition for 8 bit ZX Spectrum mini-games. You play a baby, called Harry, who has to save the world from a bunch of alien blobs while armed with nothing but a simple water pistol...good luck.
